place.name: CYNNULL MAWR
place.gazetteerText: CYNNILL-MAWR, a township in Llanfihangel-Geneur-Glynn parish, Cardigan; on the river Leri, 5 miles NE by N of Aberystwith. Acres, 3, 748. Real property, £2, 299. Pop., 616. Houses, 125. Llywdd, the antiquary, was a native. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
